S.FORM: milunguc u sulit nu Hulam: sapibetik a kamu nu Sakizaya p.188 193 sakatinacay maahemaw ku dadiwtu nu palaw mahaymaw ku culil sasukapahay nu di'tu amitekatu ku lisin saahemawen nu niyam ku suni' amibetik mihalhal tuni ka tayni nu misu tulisen a mudadiw tunu kanamuhan nu misu sakatinusa milunguc tuni pasepi nu misu pasakapahen tu ku binawlan nu binacada caay ka uning ka lilac ku uzip atu balucu' niyam maydih a litinan nu di'tuay a calay muculil i tatengaay a zazan nu di'tu sakatinulu u nabalucuan niyam amilunguc a diputen tu pasepian tu ku bakibai izaw tu ku nipisilud niyam tu tumesay nu sapibetik mipes pakay calay nu ditu amilitin apakatengil kisuwanan tu nipibetik niyam milunguc a pasepi tu wawa amin milunguc a pasepi tu payluma' amin milunguc a pasepi tu niyazu' masatekeday a sulit sakatinacay ahemaw palaw , , dadiw haymaw , , culil (misaculiculil ,makaculil ,niculilan ,culilan ) sakatinusa pasepi binawlan calay tatengaay , balucu' , , sakatinulu nabalucu'an (balucu' ) diputen pasepian (sepi , , ) tumesay mizizaw (izau ku labang mizizaw ci amaan. .) pakayakayan pakayakayay (pakayakayay ni Putal ci Amu. Putal Amu .)
